20358000.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ふふっ すごい:
Phew! It's amazing! It's a masterpiece! We've just completed the ultimate in letter paper! Oh,
customer! My apologies. I've just made a new one with Gran Zedora's castle as the subject. All the materials used
are of the highest quality. Even the water used to sip the paper was from the famous Waterfall Tears!

100831.「先ほど 剣士がひとり 城へ向かっていったが\n どこかで 見たことのあるカオだ:
I saw a swordsman heading for the castle a few minutes ago, but I've seen that face before. I don't care
about that. Whoever is coming is no longer my concern.

100832.「先ほど 城へ向かった剣士は\n テグラムという者だそうだ。\n<br>\n「…:
The swordsman who went to the castle earlier is said to be a man named Tegram. I don't care about that.
Whoever is coming is no longer my concern.

100833.「おお そなたは 旅の者か。\n ちょっと わしの頼みを聞いてはもらえんか？\n:
Oh, you are a traveler. Would you do me a favor? A man named Tegram, who went missing the other day, has
returned. He seems to be the grandson of the head squire of the castle. This man's reputation has grown as he has
been working hard for the kingdom, killing monsters and settling disputes. I, who aspire to be the
leader of this kingdom after the hero princess's death, am not at all happy about it. Therefore, I would like to
ask for your cooperation. I need to know more about your reputation, so I would like you to ask around three
residents of a nearby house about Tegram!

100834.「よし 頼まれてくれるのじゃな！\n 評判の くわしい内容がわかれば\n 打つ手:
Good, you are going to ask me for a favor! If we could find out more about his reputation, we might have a shot.
If you hear of Tegram from any of the three people who live in the houses near this one, come back here and tell
us about him.

100835.「よし 頼まれてくれるのじゃな！\n むっ。だが そなたは 多くの頼まれごとを\:
Good. You'll do me a favor, won't you? Mnh-mnh. But don't you take on many requests? If that is the case, go take
care of those first. You can do what I ask after that, so come back when you can.

100836.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「……むう。頼まれて:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Hmmm. You won't do me a favor? Then,
when you feel like it, it's all right.
Come to me again.

100837.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ウワサでは テ:
Rumor has it that Tegram has begun to take action to bring life back to the kingdom. He was a famous swordsman in
the castle, but I wonder if he is doing this knowing that he was created.

100838.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「さっき テグラ:
This Tegram guy just approached me. What's the point of being made? We are alive and here. Then we should aim for
the future. I hate preaching, but for some reason I can't forget what he said.

100839.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「私 テグラムっ:
I've only heard stories about Tegram, but he seems like a pretty nice guy. It might give a little zest to a life
that's all make-believe and no future.

100840.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「まさか ダイムの孫:
I never thought I would find Dyme's grandson, Tegram, until now. Dyme was an old friend of mine. He was in
charge of keeping the squires of the castle together, but I heard that he died the other day. He passed away
without seeing his grandson in one piece. What a pity.

100841.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「あまり くわしく:
I don't know much more, but I heard that a missing person named Tegram was found at Seabreeze Cave. But if he was
also a human who was created, it would have been better if he had been forgotten without being found.

100842.「行方不明になっていた テグラムという剣士が\n 戻ってきたそうじゃありませんか:
A missing fencer named Tegram has returned. I heard that our people are worried about his reputation in the
town. I've been fidgeting every day.

100843.「テグラムさんが 帰ってきたという出来事は\n この王国に かすかに差した\n:
Tegram's return may be a glimmer of light in this kingdom. I hope his presence will bring new hope to those
who have lost the will to live.

100844.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムさんは 帰:
Tegram came back, but my brother, who also went missing, never came back. But that's okay. We are what we were
made to be. That's just the way it was supposed to be.

100845.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ここを通った:
I told the swordsman who passed by here that I wanted to become a strong swordsman too, and he promised to
teach me how to use a sword next time. I want to become a cool swordsman like the hero princess! The hero princess
doesn't exist anymore, though.

100846.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「最近 テグラム:
I recently heard a rumor that a swordsman named Tegram is out there exterminating dangerous monsters. Why
would he do such a thing? Protecting us fakes is not going to do any good, is it?

100847.「近頃 めっぽう強い剣士が活躍していると\n ウワサになってるが まさか\n 行:
There's been a lot of talk lately about a very powerful swordsman. Tegram was reputed to be the best
swordsman in the kingdom. I thought he wouldn't die so easily.

100848.「このところ テグラムが 剣をたずさえて\n 外へと 出かけていくのを\n 毎日:
I've been seeing Tegram going out with his sword in his hand every day for a while now. It seems that he goes out
to exterminate monsters that are destroying the neighborhood. What a drunken thing to do.

100849.「テグラムの評判が 城下で高まっておってな。\n 勇者姫の亡き後 この王国の指導:
Tegram's reputation is on the rise in the castle. As I aspire to be the leader of this kingdom after the hero
princess's death, I am not very happy about it. First, I need to know more about the reputation of Tegram. I
would like you to find out more about Tegram from the kingdom's inhabitants.

100850.「この家の近くの 民家にいる住人\n ３人くらいに テグラムのことを聞いたら\n:
If you hear of Tegram from any of the three residents of the houses near this house, please come back here and
report back to us.

100851.「ウワサによると テグラムさんは\n いろいろと この王国のために\n チカラを:
Rumor has it that Tegram is doing a lot for this kingdom. Some people are calling him the second coming of the
hero princess. Is he the new leader who will lead us, the creatures?

108129.「なんですか あなたは……。\n えっ？ テグラムさんのことを\n 聞きたいです:
What are you? What? You want to hear about Tegram? Yes, my brother, who disappeared just like Tegram, is still
missing. But Mr. Tegram did. I think it's because he has something he needs to do. Maybe it's to lead this
kingdom.

108131.「テグラムさんと同じように\n 行方不明になった 私の弟は\n いまだに 帰って:
My brother, who went missing just like Tegram, still hasn't come back. But Tegram came back. I think it's because
he has something he needs to do. Maybe it's to lead this kingdom.

107879.民家にいる住人 ３人に\nテグラムのことを 聞きおわった。\nバッフル町長の所に:
I've interviewed the three residents
in the house about Tegram and will
report back to Mayor Baffle.

107880.民家にいる住人 ３人に\nテグラムのことを 聞きおわった。\nバッフル町長の所に:
I've interviewed the three residents
in the house about Tegram and will
report back to Mayor Baffle.

107881.民家にいる住人 ３人に\nテグラムのことを 聞きおわった。\nバッフル町長の所に:
I've interviewed the three residents
in the house about Tegram and will
report back to Mayor Baffle.

107891.「……なんだい 旅の人。\n テグラムさんの話が 聞きたいのかい？\n それなら:
What is it, traveler? You want to hear Tegram's story? Well, here's what happened. I was walking down the main
street the other day and I fell and broke my leg. I was totally immobilized. No one was looking at me,
and when I was in trouble, Tegram carried me on his back and brought me here. I was so moved. I was very
moved. I was so touched to hear that there was still someone who would lend a helping hand to someone who was just
a figment of my imagination.

100872.「こないだ 大通りを歩いてたら\n 転んで 足をくじいちまってさ。\n まったく:
The other day, I was walking down the main street and fell and broke my leg. I couldn't move at all. No one would
even look at me. I was in trouble, and Tegram, who was passing by, carried me on his back and brought me here. I was
so moved. I was very moved. I was so touched to hear that there was still someone who would lend a helping hand
to someone who was just a figment of my imagination.

107884.「…………なんだい 旅の人？\n ん？ テグラムのことを 聞きたいって？\n そ:
Yes, traveller? Hmm? You wanted to ask me about Tegram? Oh, yeah. Well, I saw Tegram back in town and he's been
going around, trying to cheer people up. Of course, you should come by my place. He told me to call him anytime
I needed help.

107885.「帰ってきたテグラムが\n 町のみんなを 元気づけようと\n 声をかけて まわっ:
I saw Tegram back home, going around town, trying to cheer everyone up. Of course, you should come by my house.
He told me to call him anytime I needed help.

100853.「おお 戻ってきたか！\n それで テグラムの評判のほうは\n どんな感じじゃっ:
Oh, you're back! So, how was Tegram's
reputation?

100854.「……む。まだだったか。\n それほど 急いでいるわけではないが\n 忘れんうち:
Mmm. I see you haven't done so yet.
I'm not in such a hurry, but please do
it before I forget.

100855.「……ふむう。皆 テグラムのことを\n かなり 気に入っておるようじゃな……。\:
Hmmm. Everyone seems to like Tegram a lot. Mmmmmmmmmm. My, my, Tegram. I didn't realize his popularity had
grown so much. But there must be some kind of a plot. Otherwise, he would be a dangerous monster. I'll have to ask
him about this. And now, I would like to ask another favor of you, please go and ask Tegram himself what he thinks
about helping people! I don't know much about Tegram's whereabouts. I don't know where Tegram is, but I
don't know much about him either, but I hear that he often meets with Minister Rigez, so you may have a
chance to meet him if you go to the Throne Room. I'll be counting on you, my fellow travelers!

100856.バッフル町長に 町の住人たちから聞いた内容を\n報告しますか？<yesno><c:
Would you like to report to Mayor
Baffle what you have heard from the
residents of the town?<yesno><close>

100857.「魔物退治や もめごとの解決に精を出す\n テグラムの評判が 日に日に\n 高ま:
I have discovered that Tegram's reputation for exterminating monsters and settling disputes is growing by
the day. But there must be a motive behind this. I am anxious to lead this kingdom after the death of my hero
princess. So, I would like you to ask Tegram himself what he is thinking of helping people like that!

100858.「リゲス大臣とは よく会っているそうなので \n 玉座の間に行けば 会える機会も:
I heard that you and Minister Rigez meet often, so there will be a chance to see each other if you go to the
throne room. So, please do me a favor, fellow travelers!

107861.「おお 戻ったか 旅の者。\n テグラムに 話を聞いてきてくれたのじゃな。\n:
Ah, you are back, traveler. You've
come to talk to Tegram. Then report
back to me.

107862.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「ふむ……。王国:
Hmm. He says he is only doing what he can for the kingdom. He talks a cool game. And Minister Rigez and his
followers are beginning to recognize Tegram as a leader? Hmmm. This is bad.

107863.<icon_exc>「おお そうじゃ！ ガリアル洞とやらに\n 凶悪な魔物が 現:
Oh, yes! There was a report of a vicious monster in Garial Cave, wasn't there? It seems that Mr. Tegram is
very busy. In that case, it would be better if we were to exterminate the monster instead! That's why I'm asking
you to exterminate the monster. I want you to go to Garial Cave in Gran Zedora Territory and exterminate the
monster with great skill!

100859.<pc>は 玉座の間でのやりとりを\nすべて バッフル町長に報告した！:
<pc> reported all throne Room
interactions to Mayor Baffle!

100860.「何かと忙しい テグラム殿の代わりに\n 魔物退治は こちらで してさしあげるの:
I think it would be better if we take care of monster extermination on behalf of Tegram, who is busy with
other things!

100861.「というわけで そなたに 魔物退治を頼みたい。\n グランゼドーラ領のガリアル洞:
That's why I'm asking you to exterminate the monster. I want you to go to Garial Cave in Gran Zedora
Territory and exterminate the monster!

107865.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお 旅の者か:
Oh, traveler. I have decided that I no longer wish to be the leader of this kingdom. I have realized that Tegram
is the one who truly deserves to be the leader! Nevertheless, I must repay you for all you have done for me. Take
this.

107866.「わしは これから テグラムさまを\n 指導者として 盛り立てることに\n 持て:
I intend to devote all my energies to
making Tegram's leadership a success!

107867.「うちの人 この間まで 王国の指導者になると\n 息巻いていたのに 急に 自分は:
Our man, who until recently was talking about becoming the leader of the kingdom, has suddenly started
saying that he is not fit to be a leader. Well, I thought so too. I think a leader like Tegram is the
right person for the job.

100863.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「テグラム殿は:
Tegram-sama seems to be on his way to slay the monster with his sword. I used to see off the hero princess in
the same way. I miss her so much.

100864.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「わしは これか:
I intend to devote all my energies to making Tegram's leadership a success! Oh, yes. I must tell the townspeople
about Tegram's success. I'm going to be busy from now on!

100865.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ウワサによると:
Rumor has it that Mr. Tegram saved Mayor Baffle from a monstrous monster. Some are calling him the second coming
of the hero princess. He is the new leader who will lead us, the creatures!

100866.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「町長さんのピン:
I heard that when the mayor was in trouble, Tegram came out of nowhere and saved the mayor's life by cutting
down the monster with a single cut! Not only does he look strong, but he's also very strong. Maybe you should try
your best to live your life for him.

100867.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「うーむ。テグラ:
It seems that Tegram is serious about rebuilding this kingdom. The despair of the kingdom's people is
unfathomable when they realize they are fakes. It will not be easy. But I believe Tegram can do it. I am sure
that Dyme's grandson can do it.

100868.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「なんだか 町の:
Everyone in town is talking about Tegram. He's working for the good of the kingdom. But why would Tegram do
such a thing? All these people here are fakes.

100869.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムって剣士の:
I heard that Tegram is the talk of the town, but I can't believe it. If it were a pretty, beautiful swordswoman,
I'd start a fan club right away.

100870.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「テグラムさんの:
Tegram's presence is beginning to give people hope. I believe that if he continues to lead, he will be able to
restore the kingdom to its former vigor and vitality.

100871.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「そっか……。テグラ:
I see...Tegram must have been able to come back because he had a role to play in saving this kingdom. But my
brother was just an ordinary young man with nothing special to offer, so it's no wonder he didn't come back.

107892.「こないだ 大通りを歩いてたら\n 転んで 足をくじいちまってさ。\n まったく:
The other day, I was walking down the main street and fell and broke my leg. I couldn't move at all. No one would
even look at me. I was in trouble, and Tegram, who was passing by, carried me on his back and brought me here. I was
so moved. I was very moved. I was so touched to hear that there was still someone who would lend a helping hand
to someone who was just a figment of my imagination.

100873.「町の人たちが あちこちで\n 剣士のお兄さんのことを 話してるんだ。\n<br:
People in town are talking about your brother, the swordsman, here and there. Do you all want to learn sword
from him? But I'm the one who promised to be the first one to learn how to use a sword!

100874.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「先ほど バッフ:
Mayor Baffle came to me a few minutes ago to ask for my help in getting Tegram up and running as a new leader.
I thought he was talking about being the leader of Tegram until the other day.

100875.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「町長さんが テ:
The mayor has been going around telling everyone in the kingdom that he wants Tegram to be the new leader.
If the mayor trusts him that much, there's no reason why we shouldn't like him.

100876.「日ごと テグラムの活躍のウワサが\n 王国中に 広がっていってるんだ。\n<b:
Every day, rumors of Tegram's success spread throughout the kingdom. Especially, the mayor of the town is
very much into it. He's going around telling everyone that Tegram should be the leader.

100969.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「テグラム殿は:
It seems that Tegram has begun to take an active role in the kingdom. He is going to do something big in the
future. We are looking forward to it.

100970.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「おお 旅の者よ:
Oh, traveler. Thanks to you, Tegram is doing very well as the leader of the kingdom. I am helping him as much as I
can. The day is near when this kingdom will be restored!

100971.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムさんに:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>If we follow Tegram, we can open up a
new future for this kingdom. I will do
whatever it takes to help you!

100972.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「勇者姫は いな:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>The hero princess is gone, but now the
kingdom has a man named Tegram. He
gives us hope!

100973.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ああん テグラ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>Oh, Tegram. I will follow you for the
rest of my life!

100974.「孫のテグラムの活躍で\n この王国が 再生を果たしたとなれば\n 死んだダイム:
If this kingdom has been revitalized through the work of his grandson Tegram, it will be a relief to Dyme,
who died.

100975.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この先にある:
The big bridge at the end of the road is called the Bridge of Heroes. Legend has it that Hero single-handedly wiped
out a swarm of hundreds of monsters that had filled this bridge in pursuit of the castle. This legend, too, is a
myth, but that doesn't matter anymore. From now on, we will call it Tegram's Bridge.

100976.「なぜかは知らんが この国の人たちが\n また 明るさを 取り戻したようだ。\n:
I don't know why, but it seems the people of this country have regained their brightness. Apparently a
swordsman named Tegram has become the new leader of this country. I guess it's because of that man.

100977.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「……ああ テグラム:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>Oh, Tegram. Please give us new hope.
Give us a new future.

100978.「テグラムさまは 王国のみんなの信頼を\n 完全に 勝ち取っておりますわ。\n<:
You have won the complete trust of everyone in the kingdom. If our people had become leaders, they would have
been very disappointed with Tegram.

100979.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムさんは:
Tegram is neither a pretty swordswoman nor a sexy mage, but I like her! I even created a fan club. The number of
members is growing steadily!

100980.「テグラムさんは 皆の希望。\n 彼こそが この王国を よき未来へと\n 導いて:
Tegram is everyone's hope. He is the
one who will lead this kingdom into a
better future.

100981.「私に できることなんて ほとんどないけど\n この王国が 以前のような活気を取:
There's not much I can do, but I'll do
whatever it takes to make this kingdom
thrive again.

100982.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムさんに:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>If you follow Tegram's lead, this
kingdom will be saved. That day is
almost here!

100983.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「剣士のお兄さん な:
It seems that your brother, the swordsman, is very busy. I wonder if he forgot his promise to teach me how
to use a sword.

100984.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「テグラムが こ:
Tegram is touted as the savior of this crumbling kingdom. We have lost our hero princess, and they say he will
lead us to a new future. We are truly grateful.

100985.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あんた 聞いた:
Did you hear that? Tegram is going to lead this kingdom into a new future. We should be thankful to the mayor for
finding such a great leader.

100986.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムならば:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>We all believe that Tegram will save
this kingdom from the depths of
despair. Including me, of course.

100987.「我々は 誰かに頼って 生きていくことが\n 当たり前だと 思っていたようだ……:
It seems we took it for granted that we would have to depend on someone else to survive. From now on, we must
make the kingdom a better place through our own efforts.

100988.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「テグラムさまの:
Tegram's words seemed to have struck a chord with the people of the town. Even without an absolute leader, this
kingdom will surely regain its former vigor. I, as the mayor, must be fired up too!

100989.「テグラムさんが この王国を出ていく必要は\n なかったんじゃないですかね……。:
I guess Tegram didn't have to leave this kingdom. No. If he were here, we'd probably depend on him again. I
see. That's why Tegram...

100990.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「みんなが いろ:
If we all think things through and try to make this kingdom a better place, we don't have to follow just one
person's words. We make our own future. A man named Tegram taught me that.

100992.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「テグラムさまは:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>I wonder where on earth Ms. Tegram is
headed. I wish I could have taken you
with me.

100993.「ダイムよ 見ておったか……？\n お前の孫テグラムは 見事に\n この王国を:
Did you see it, Dyme? Your grandson
Tegram has done a magnificent job of
restoring this kingdom.

100994.「この先にある 大きな橋は\n みんなから 勇者の橋と 呼ばれている。\n<br:
The big bridge at the end of the road is called the Bridge of Heroes. Legend has it that Hero single-handedly wiped
out a swarm of hundreds of monsters that had filled this bridge in pursuit of the castle. This legend was also
made up, but that doesn't matter anymore. When the monsters come, we'll be the ones to intercept them.

100995.「聞くところによると この王国の\n 指導者になるはずだった テグラムという男が:
I heard that Tegram, the man who was supposed to be the leader of this kingdom, suddenly left for a trip. And
yet, everyone in the kingdom is putting on a hopeful face. I don't understand this place.

100996.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私たちは テグ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>We will never forget Tegram. Without
him, we would have spent our days in
vain, trapped in despair.

100997.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「うちの人は 指:
I may not have the same caliber of leadership as the hero princess or Tegram, but I do have a fair amount of
experience as a town mayor. I believe that with the cooperation of the townspeople, we can create a kingdom
full of hope.

100998.「テグラムさんは 行っちまったけど\n オレの作った ファンクラブは\n 町の青:
Tegram is gone, but my Fan Club will continue to be active as the town's youth group. The members will take
turns visiting the town to see what's going on. I think there are things we can do for the kingdom.

100999.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「テグラムさんは:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Tegram has left us with a glimmer of
hope in our hearts.

101000.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この王国が 以:
I'll do whatever it takes to bring this kingdom back to its former glory, even if it means dying. It's doubtful
he's even alive to begin with.

101001.「魔勇者が 復活を果たしたら\n この王国は どうなっていたのかしら……？\n<:
What would have happened to this kingdom if the demon Hero had made a comeback? Maybe life could go back to
the way it was before, but I doubt we would want that anymore.

101002.「結局 剣士のお兄さんは\n ボクに 剣を教えてくれなかったな……。\n<br>:
In the end, my swordsman brother didn't teach me how to use a sword. But that's okay. Even if no one
teaches me how to use a sword, I'll try my best on my own!

101003.「テグラムを支配しようとした 魔勇者ってのは\n たぶん 勇者姫のことなんだろう:
The demon hero who tried to rule Tegram is probably a hero princess. Now I feel terrible that I used to
praise her as a hero.

101004.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ちょっと 頼り:
I know I'm a bit unreliable, but with the mayor and the minister at the center, I'm going to make this kingdom
a better place to live. For the sake of our children, we must make this a livable and comfortable place to live!

101005.「我々は 勇者姫をあがめるためだけに\n 生きてきた ただの人形だった。\n<b:
We were mere puppets who lived only to glorify the hero princess. But from now on, we will be different. We will
live to make this Gran Zedora Kingdom a wonderful country.

65422.「旅の者か？ よく来たな！\n ここは グランゼドーラ王国だ。\n<br>\n「:
Are you a traveler? Welcome! This is Gran Zedora Kingdom. What? A great light shines forth from this kingdom,
saving people in peril? You saw it in your home village? Hmm. You heard that light was the light of Hero's
awakening and came here to meet Hero. I have not seen such a light, but Princess Anlucia, the Hero, has been
here in the Gran Zedora Kingdom for a long time!

65423.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「こちらは グ:
This is the entrance to Gran Zedora Harbor. There are no flights to Lendor Island due to the Grand Titus being
cancelled at this time. We apologize for the inconvenience.

65424.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「旅の者か。グラ:
Welcome to the Kingdom of Gran Zedora. My name is Baffle and I am the mayor of Castle Town. Thanks to the hero
princess, the town is at peace. I'm enjoying my time as mayor.

65425.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「おや？ あなた:
Oh? You are not from this country, are you? Did you come to Gran Zedora Kingdom because you heard a rumor
about a hero princess?

65426.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「いやいや。こん:
No, no, no. There was no need to ask such a question. I'm sure you've come to see the hero princess, no matter
what I think!

75946.「この前 全財産が入った財布を\n スられちまってな。困っていたんだが\n 勇者:
The other day, someone stole my wallet with all my money in it. I was in trouble, but the hero princess caught
the thief right away. He came from somewhere else and didn't know there was a hero princess in this country.
He's a real dummy, that's for sure.

65427.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「本当に たまに:
It really happens once in a while, but there are incidents of people from the town going missing. But don't worry,
travelers. The hero princess has promised to find them.

65428.「お前さんは 旅の人かね。\n どこから来たのかは 知らんが\n この国の都会っ:
Are you a traveler? I don't know where you are from, but you must be surprised at how urban this country
is. It's all thanks to the hero princess. She is a hero, but she also serves as the King's representative
and works with all her might. I am sure she will be good to the travelers. Go to the castle now and
see the hero princess at least once.

65429.「この先にある 大きな橋は\n みんなから 勇者の橋と 呼ばれているんだ。\n<:
The big bridge at the end of the road is called Bridge of Heroes by everyone. Legend has it that an
ancient Hero single-handedly wiped out a swarm of hundreds of monsters that were swarming across the bridge, all
in pursuit of the castle.

65430.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ココラタの浜辺:
It's been a long and arduous journey, over fields and mountains, but it's been worth it. It seems there is a
Hero in this country. If we can get him to give our product a "Hero's seal of approval," we'll be in business!

65431.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ああ～ん……。:
I wonder if the hero princess will not be in town today. I have to see the princess at least once a day or I
won't be able to sleep well. Maybe I should go see her at the castle.

65432.「あらあら 旅のお方ですか。\n お城に おわす アンルシア姫さまとは\n もう:
Oh, dear, you are a traveler, aren't
you? Have you met Princess Anlucia at
the castle yet?<yesno><break>

65433.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「アンルシア姫さ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Princess Anlucia is a wise ruler and a
peerless Hero. You should be honored
to meet her!

65434.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「それは いけま:
<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>That's not right! We must first of all
ask Princess Anlucia to make an
appearance!

65435.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「オレのカンによ:
My hunch is that Princess Anlucia will pass this way on her next visit! Today is the day I'm going to get her to
sign this piece of paper. I'll get her to sign it today, on the pride and determination of Princess AnluciaFan
Club member number 001!

65436.「現在 乗船券の販売は\n 中止とさせて いただいております。\n<br>\n「:
Ticket sales are currently suspended. We have not yet determined when sales will resume. We apologize for any
inconvenience this may cause.

65437.「勇者姫さまの ご活躍によって\n この王国の平和が 保たれております。\n<b:
The peace of this kingdom is
maintained by the hero princess. May
God bless you, hero princess.

65438.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「一緒に住んでいた:
I don't know how long it's been since my brother, who lived with us, went missing one day. But it's all right.
Because the hero princess promised me that she would find him.

83035.<center>『勇者姫に捧ぐ歌』上演決定！\n乞うご期待！！:
Songs for hero princess" will be
performed! Please look forward to it!

83036.『我が親愛なる勇者姫よ』は 閉演いたしました。\nご好評いただき ありがとうござ:
My Dear Hero Princess" has closed.
Thank you very much for your favorable
reception.

65439.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「この国は とて:
This country is very safe and you don't need to be scared of monsters. I can live in peace without any worries.
All this is thanks to Hero Princess Anlucia. Thank you, thank you, thank you.

65440.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「ボク 見たんだ:
I saw it! Princess Anlucia was walking around dressed as a normal girl! But no one will believe me, saying that it
can't be true. She was definitely a princess!

65441.「あんた 冒険者だね？\n なかなか ウデは立ちそうだが\n 残念ながら この国:
You're an adventurer, aren't you? You seem to be quite skilled, but I'm afraid you won't have much to do in
this country. After all, we have a hero princess. No matter what kind of scary monster appears, she'll get rid
of it.

65442.「あんた 旅の人かい？\n グランゼドーラのお城には もう行った？\n<br>\:
Are you a traveler? Have you been to the castle of Gran Zedora yet? You must see the statue of Hero on the
first floor of the castle. You won't find another statue as magnificent as that one!

65443.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「そこの劇場では:
I heard that the theater there is preparing a play in honor of Hero. I'm sure it will be a play modeled on the
exploits of the hero princess. I'm looking forward to it!

65444.「ここは グランゼドーラ王国。\n 勇者姫アンルシアさまが 治める国だ。:
This is the Gran Zedora Kingdom, ruled
by the Hero Princess Anlucia.

65445.「お前さんは 旅の人かね。 \n どこから来たのかは 知らんが\n この国の都会:
Are you a traveler?I don't know where you are from, but you must be surprised at how urban this country
is. It's all thanks to the hero princess. She is a hero, but she is also the King's representative, and
she works with all her might.

65446.「先ほど 勇者姫アンルシアさまが\n 魔物退治に ご出陣なされたのだ。\n いつ:
A few minutes ago, Hero Princess Anlucia went out to kill the monsters. As usual, she took only a few soldiers
with her. What? You're going too? If that's what Anlucia-sama wants, we have no choice but to be tough so that
we don't drag her down!

65447.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「うおおーっ。さ:
Wow. Princess Anlucia passed by here just as I expected. My instincts as the 001st member of Princess Anlucia
Fan Club were right. I only got to see her, though!

65448.「南のゼドラ洞に 魔物が現れたって\n ウワサになってるんだ。\n なんでも 赤:
There is a rumor that a monster has appeared in Zedra Cave in the south. A big red dragon monster. The hero
princess is on her way to exterminate it. Red or big, if the princess is concerned, the monster's life will
probably end today.

65449.「グランゼドーラのお城に行って\n 勇者さまの像を 見たかい？\n<br>\n「:
Have you been to the castle in Gran Zedora and seen the statue of Hero? It's that big. I don't think you can
miss it!

65450.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「娘を引っ立てた:
Hero Princess Anlucia was on her way to the castle with two soldiers who were leading her daughter. She looked
a lot like Anlucia. Perhaps she was misbehaving in the name of the princess. What a stupid thing to do.

65451.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「勇者姫さまが:
If the hero princess awakens as a true hero, we can be sure that this kingdom will flourish even more as the center
of Astoltia. And my name as the mayor of Castle Town in this kingdom will be roared around the world! Ha-ha-ha-ha!

65452.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「魔物退治より:
The hero princess returned from exterminating monsters and announced to the people of the town that she
herself would awaken to the role of a true hero. I didn't know more about her awakening, but I guess it's
something to be celebrated!

75947.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「勇者姫が 覚醒:
The hero princess is about to awaken, and the town is in an uproar. I guess that's right. Once the hero princess
has the power of a true Hero, there's nothing to fear anymore!

65453.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ちょっと！ あ:
Psst! Did you hear that? I heard that the hero princess is finally going to wake up as a true Hero! Ahh~! What if
she becomes even cooler than before~<&2a>

65454.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ああ。アンルシ:
Ah, Princess Anlucia is awakening to the true Hero. We don't have to fear anything anymore. Yes. Eternal
happiness is promised!

65455.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「アンルシア姫さ:
Princess Anlucia is going to awaken as a true Hero! As Fan Club member number 001, I can't stay silent about this. I
don't know what will change, but I have to go see the newly awakened princess with my own eyes!

65456.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ボクさ。普通の:
Me. I thought I saw Princess Anlucia dressed as a normal girl, but it turned out to be another woman. I saw
the princess walking towards the castle with a woman who looked just like her. What a bore~.

65457.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「町中が 勇者姫:
The whole town seems to be talking about the hero princess's awakening. All the hard work the princess has put
in must have been for this moment. She is indeed our hero princess!

65458.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「アンルシア姫さ:
The day has come for Princess Anlucia to awaken as a Hero! I don't really know what awakening is, but I'm sure
she'll become an even better Hero than she is now!

70191.「お前は <pc>だな？\n 勇者姫アンルシアさまより 伝言を\n 預かっている:
You are , are you not? I have a message for you from Hero Princess Anlucia, so listen carefully.
If you wish to follow me to the Creatorium, come to the Ritual Hall in the basement of Alltrades Abbey. I
have no idea what you're talking about. Anyway, I got the message!

70192.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「あなた 見まし:
Did you see it? A white light rose quickly from the castle to the heavens! Nothing has been reported
from the castle, but I wonder if that is the proof that Princess Anlucia has awakened to the true Hero?

75948.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「城から 放たれ:
When I saw the light emitted from the castle, I felt like my heart was being refreshed. I'm sure it was the light
of Hero's awakening.

70193.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「あれほどに 美:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>It was the first time in my life that
I saw such a beautiful shine. Well.
I'm sure I'll live a long life.

70194.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「はああ……。お:
Huh. The light emitted from the castle. It was so beautiful and shining. It was like the smile of a
hero princess.

70195.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「アンルシア姫さ:
I, Princess Anlucia Fan Club member number 001, know what I'm talking about. That beautiful light was
emitted by the Princess. That's right! It must be!

70196.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ボク 見たんだ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>I saw it! The top of the castle was
glowing white and it was amazing! It's
true.

70197.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「お城から 真っ:
The true white light rose into the sky from the castle! I've never seen anything like that before. But what
kind of light was it?

76182.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「我らの勇者姫は い:
Our hero princess is gone. Welcome to the Gran Zedora Kingdom, land of despair. Why am I standing here? How
long do I have to stand here? I don't know what to do.

76183.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「こちらは グ:
<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>This is the entrance to Gran Zedora
Harbor. It seems that the day when the
Grand Titus arrives will never come.

76184.「も……もうダメだ。\n わしの町長人生も おしまいだ。\n<br>\n「いや:
It's all over. My life as mayor has come to an end. No, wait, don't you think that in the absence of the hero
princess, an opportunity has presented itself for me to become the head of this country?

76185.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「勇者姫さまが 何者:
When the hero princess was defeated by someone, everyone in this country realized. We were false, false, false
beings created only to glorify the hero princess.

76186.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「オレたちが 作:
You think we're just figments? How can you believe such a ridiculous thing? And yet we know it's true. Damn it.
What the hell was that?

76187.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr>「私が この町に:
I thought it was my own choice to live in this town and honor the hero princess, but it wasn't. It was always
meant to be from the very beginning. What a crappy life I've had!

76188.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「この国は わしらが:
We thought our country had prospered thanks to the hero princess we admired, but we were wrong. It was all
pre-made. It didn't matter if there was a hero princess or not.

76189.「この先にある 大きな橋は\n みんなから 勇者の橋と 呼ばれている。\n<br:
The big bridge at the end of the road is called the Bridge of Heroes. Legend has it that Hero single-handedly wiped
out a swarm of hundreds of monsters that had filled this bridge in pursuit of the castle. But this legend, too,
is a myth. Ha-ha-ha-ha!

76190.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「……この国の人:
Don't you think the people of this country have suddenly gone crazy? They suddenly became lethargic and started
talking nonsense. What in the world happened?

76191.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ああ……。生きてい:
Ah. It's so boring to live. I can't wait to disappear from this world like the hero princess. Because we were
created only to glorify the hero princess. What are we supposed to do without the hero princess?

76192.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「なぜ この町の:
Why did everyone in this town praise Princess Anlucia in the same way? I now know exactly why. We are puppets
designed to do nothing but worship the princess. Isn't that awful?

76193.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「アンルシア姫ファン:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>The Princess AnluciaFan Club has been
disbanded. It's funny that I, a fake,
was longing for a fake princess.

76194.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「お客さま。申し訳ご:
Dear customer. I'm sorry, but ticket sales have been canceled. This is a town of false things. That's why the
Grand Titus will never come.

76195.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「人間は 神が創りた:
I have lived my whole life being told that humans are God's creation. But the people of this country are
different. They were created by someone who is not God.

76196.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「行方不明の弟は 勇:
My missing brother was murdered by the hero princess. And yet, I always believed that the hero princess would
find him. No wonder I was made to believe in hero princesses no matter what. Mmm-hmm.

83037.『勇者姫に捧ぐ歌』の上演は\n都合により 中止とさせていただきます。\n次回上演:
The performance of "Songs for a hero princess" has been cancelled due to circumstances. The next performance is
yet to be determined.

83038.出し物の案内が 貼られているが\n文字が乱暴に ぬりつぶされている。:
The information about the events is
posted on the wall, but the words have
been roughly smudged.

76197.「この町や城も 私たち住人すらも\n 勇者姫のために 用意されたものなんだとさ。:
This town, the castle, and even we, the inhabitants, were prepared for the hero princess. We spend our days
glorifying the hero princess, but we were meant to do that from the beginning.

76198.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「勇者姫さまは もう:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>The hero princess is gone. I don't
know why, but we've figured it out.

76199.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「…………なんだい？:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>Yes? I'm sorry, but can you leave me
alone? I'm in a bad mood.

76200.<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>「お城に行っても も:
<attr><feel_sad_lv2><end_attr>There's no more hero princess at the
castle. I've figured it all out. Our
princess has abandoned us.

76201.「我々は 作り物の勇者姫のまわりで\n 彼女を 盛り上げるための脇役だったんだ。:
We were the supporting cast to liven her up around the fake hero princess. Just like the play they were going to
put on at the theater there. I wish they had given her a better role, instead of just a townie with no
class.

76202.「勇者姫が いなくなったと\n この国の人たちが ずっと言ってるんだが\n いっ:
People in this country keep saying that the hero princess is missing, but what the hell happened to her? The
only way I can think of that Hero could have gone wrong is through the work of the Great Demon King, as I've
heard rumors.
